section.title: Creating user accountsEO_users
section.para: If you want your employees to enroll their own devices, each employee of your company must have a unique account in Symantec Security Cloud. You can create user accounts manually, or you can use Azure Active Directory Sync to import users from your directory service.
See Connecting with Azure Active Directory Sync
When you add a user, an activation email is sent to the address you provided. The user needs to accept the invitation and create a password to activate the account.

itemizedlist.title: To create a user account, you provide the following information:

listitem.para: Associates the user with your company
Used to sign in to Symantec Security Cloud
See How groups manage policy flow in Symantec Security Cloud

note.para: If you import users from Azure AD Sync, all users are assigned the User role and added to the default group.

step.para: In Symantec Security Cloud, on the Groups, Users, and Devices page, select the plus icon, and then select Create New User.
In the Enter User Information window, enter the required user information.
Select a group for the user.
